name: Thyroid Classification
desc: Developed a web-based machine learning application to classify thyroid conditions into Hyperthyroidism, Hypothyroidism, or Normal, based on user inputs like TSH, T3, T4, and Age. The model was trained using a Random Forest Classifier and integrated into a Flask web application with a user-friendly HTML frontend.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: This is my personal portfolio website, showcasing my skills, projects, and experiences. It is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Parking System Management
desc: This is a parking system management application that allows users to book and manage parking spaces. It is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
